#summary UxTheme detours.


The VCL Styles Utils allows style the [http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/bb787471%28v=vs.85%29.aspx Task Dialogs]. In order to activate this feature those units must be included in the VCL Application.


    <li>[https://code.google.com/p/vcl-styles-utils/source/browse/trunk/Common/Vcl.Styles.Utils.Forms.pas Vcl.Styles.Utils.Forms]</li> 
    <li>[https://code.google.com/p/vcl-styles-utils/source/browse/trunk/Common/Vcl.Styles.Utils.SysStyleHook.pas Vcl.Styles.Utils.SysStyleHook]</li>
    <li>[https://code.google.com/p/vcl-styles-utils/source/browse/trunk/Common/Vcl.Styles.Utils.SysControls.pas Vcl.Styles.Utils.SysControls]</li>
    <li>[https://code.google.com/p/vcl-styles-utils/source/browse/trunk/Common/Vcl.Styles.Hooks.pas Vcl.Styles.Hooks]</li>


Note : the Task Dialogs are available since Windows Vista.
